parameters: It seems to be a mining Journal of sorts.
There are lots of irrelevant inventory records
here, but there is a sheet of notes that looks
to be from a ripped out journal. It says:
"The gaffer sure was paranoid. He stashed
the gold cache in the storeroom, and locked it
with those stupid pressure plates. Crazy fool -
he even came up with some sort of riddle to
trick any would-be robbers. How did it go
again? "The maidens of eternity, bide their
